website_summaries.verdict: A good robotic cleaning option for anyone looking for an affordable and capable ILIFE vacuum.
pros: Vacuum can handle thick carpets and regular hardwood floors without damaging the surface
Runs more quietly than other common robotic vacuums
cons: The vacuum will struggle with typical or thick carpets and rugs

customer_reviews.title: Great,  until it grinded a hole in my floor!
customer_reviews.text: I generally keep my floor clean of wires as to not obstruct this vacuum. I came home today and it was stuck on a cord and the 2 powered wheels had grinded 2 holes in my laminate floor! Bad robot!
customer_reviews.author: Marya Horne

customer_reviews.title: iLife Robot Review - good unit at a low cost
customer_reviews.text: Likes: very quiet, picks up lots of pet hair (Bissell 1974 we previously had did not do as well), parks straight in rather than backing in, wireless remote easy to use. Dislikes: the schedule works the same time each day (would be nice to only run on the weekends), dust bin not easy to remove/clean, occasionally gets 'stuck' under the dining room table (putting chairs up fixes this), not sure how long it runs (we use it when not at home) so have to look at the rug tracks. Overall happy with the unit. A lot of bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert E. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: but it has been amazing. Last year we moved into a 2500 sf ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when ordering this vacuum...but it has been amazing. Last year we moved into a 2500 sf home (from 1200) and were amazed how much more time we spent cleaning! The first floor is about 2000 sf and all tile...we have 2 indoor boxers...hello dog hair! We have used this for about 3 weeks now and it is a life saver. I don't have to wear socks anymore to keep my feet clean and we don't have to sweep/vacuum every other day since tis is working for us while we are gone. Now...I just need to order the one that will mop for us!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Z.

customer_reviews.title: Only for two months.
customer_reviews.text: It was good in the beginning. I have a hard floor with rugs and it was perfect for both my place and my back. In two months, it stopped working. Yes it charges and it runs around. But it barely vacuums, and leaves hair and dirt on the edge of the rugs. And now I can't return it. I suggest not to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kana

customer_reviews.title: Not good! :(
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted to like this product. :( I got it and the first day it just seemed confused. It kept getting stuck on our kitchen chairs it would go around them a ridiculous amount of times. Then, before we left the house I put it on “go home” mode. I returned and found it under our living room chair dead, which it was never in the room before I left, so that was pretty weird. Then, tonight I was in the living room and it got stuck under our chair again and just ran and ran. My fear is that when we are asleep or away and it keeps running continuously.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to setup. Let it charge overnight and it was ready to go. It did a nice job of going under tables and chairs. I don't run it when I'm not going to be in the house because it does get stuck under our kitchen cabinets sometimes and just sits there and spins so I don't want it to somehow wear a hole in the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a nice machine while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this again because it didn't last but about a year, if that. Something went wrong one day and there was no getting it repaired. We have had our Roomba 960 for nearly 2 years now and it's been a workhorse. So I guess there's a difference in quality and price with these machines and the differences mean something. I did like the compact size of this machine. It ran under most of the furniture with ease. Price was affordable, which was nice at the time. So its not a total wash.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this on March 3rd and it’s already not working. I’m very upset. The return window is already closed for it. I will be contacting the company for a replacement or my money back and if that didn’t happen well the whole world will be warned about buying this lemon of a product.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on dark carpet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with how easy it wa to program and how quiet it is. Used it on light colored carpet and wood floor and it worked well. It avoids obstacles well. Then I brought it to another floor with dark carpet and it didn’t work well at all. It would run for a minute and then start backing up unexpectedly. It then just beeped and stopped. I wish there were a way to set it for darker floors. ***review update- the vacuum no longer works. It started periodically backing up and looking like it was stuck, and now it won’t run more than a minute before stopping. There is some kind of a failure it the forward sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Tate

customer_reviews.title: You will still need to get up off your butt
customer_reviews.text: You can’t just sit on the couch watching comfortably while this little robot cleans your floors. Nope. This little robot was pretty stupid and will get stuck anywhere and everywhere. First off, make sure you pick up any small toys, cables and other items off the floor first. This thing will try to suck up anything and everything in its way. Now whether it actually goes over anything is completely random too. Secondly, it really is super inefficient. It goes over the same spots over and over again while ignoring other spots completely. It’s novelty for sure but still a far away from Rosie on the Jetsons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum for the price. I have two cats, one who throws litter everywhere and one that sheds like crazy. After the vacuum does it's run through the house it's spotless! Also it has a great suction power and has no trouble going on and off of our rugs. Once charged we schedule it to run at the same time everyday. The run cycle is about an hour and 1/2 long. It does get a little louder when going over carpet but that is just the amount of suction increasing! 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: 2nd A4s
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd A4 and I also have a iLife V8 pro. Both work great but after about a year and a half my original A4 began to act up. I fully cleaned it and tried replacing the battery but my original just kept spinning a bit and turning off. For the price and daily cleaning I still think it’s a great product though which is why I just purchased the newer version of the A4. It’s added functions work great and it seems to have more suction than the previous version.
customer_reviews.author: VAuser56479

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! I schedule it to run every day. It's slim profile goes under furniture easily. Crosses thresholds without a problem. Goes from hardwood to area rugs without a problem. Easy to empty collection bin. My only complaint, which is why I didn't give it 5 stars, is that the filter is not washable. This adds to the cost of usage by having to get replacement filters, though the cost of this unit is quite reasonable. This is the third robot vacuum I've used, and by far, the best! I've only had it a couple of months, so we will have to see about it's longevity.
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging itself
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine picking up dog hair in the beginning. Had issues initially landing on its dock, but that seemed to self correct. About 6 weeks in, it stopped charging. It landed on the dock, but would not charge. Past the 30 day return mark so I can't return it. Save yourself the hassle! Update: the company was good enough to give me a full refund even though i was past the 30 day policy since i had received a lemon. this company clearly stands behind its product and that is appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where did she find all of this dust?
customer_reviews.text: We love our vacuum cleaner! #1- We had to name her... Vivian. #2 She cleans wonderful! Nooks, crannys Viv cleans everywhere. I cannot think of any cons. We make sure that the dustbin is cleaned and the brushes cleaned. Every little while when we hear a squeaking noise we will remove the small front wheel ... clean off the small rod and wipe out the bowl area that it sits in. I need to replace the filter, but that's just ordinary maintenance. Conclusion: We thoroughly enjoy having fresh vacuumed floors! We recommend our ILife Robot Vacuum Cleaner to everyone with hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Reeb

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these little guys for over two years now. I have 6 cats and it’s so easy to keep my house clean! Will never go back to other vacuums. If you have cats, just make sure there is no pee or vomit on the floor. Also don’t leave the robot charging in the open. If your cat pees over it, it may completely damage it. I have one for upstairs and one for each level downstairs just beacause I like to clean fast. They will run for about two hours with a full charge. Great quality and fairly easy to mantain. Also great price! Also use them at office and beach apartment! They have changed my life!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen  Santos

customer_reviews.title: cleaner
customer_reviews.text: First time to buy a robot vacuum cleaner on Amazon. It works just like Irobot. It has a remote that I can control it easily. It goes back to charge itself when it runs out of the power. It really helped a lot with our house work.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do a good job
customer_reviews.text: We have been pleasantly surprised by the vacuum's performance. My daughters produce a lot of hair so it does tangle the brush often but it is easily removed. The same is true for emptying the dirt receptacle. My only complaint is that the charge on the battery does not seem to last very long. It seems I can only do about 2-3 rooms per charge. So I just run it pretty much every day in different parts of the house. It's quiet and seldom gets stuck on things so it seems to be working out.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Good

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum. We have two dogs and two cats and it really helps me keep up with the vacuuming. I run it every day and its constantly full (which is kind of scary but in a good way!). I had an issue with it last month as it started getting loud and the ILife team was very responsive and helped me get it fixed. Cannot say enough good things about this product and company. I am shopping for another one for my upstairs now!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Cantu

customer_reviews.title: great little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I did not think that I needed a robotic vacuum but I was wrong. I love this vacuum! It works beautifully. I run it everyday. I clean my little vacuum after it returns to the homebase. I have long hair and it gets wrapped around the brushes but that happens with a regular vacuum. I also have a cat and two small dogs that shed quite a bit. When the vacuum gets wrapped up with too much hair or string it stops and gives 4 little beeps. I love this vacuum! I'm back to going barefoot through my house!
customer_reviews.author: TracyS

customer_reviews.title: Great to help keep dog hair cleaned up
customer_reviews.text: I bought his in Dec 2019. I have 3 springer spaniels who shed like crazy. This is good for me to set to go on each day during the week. Plus you can just hit clean at any time and it will do it’s thing. It picks up hair fairly well. If it hits a transition the hair not sucked in usually will be in a pile by where it hit. Easy to clean. Comes with spare brush head. Ran over poop twice and was able to take the brushes apart and clean easily. Runs for about 1.5 hours each time. I put my Couch on furniture moving pads so it can go underneath and clean. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: One year later....
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a year since we got this little guy and he’s still going strong! He’s been attacked by multiple toddlers and lived to tell the tale. I don’t rinse the filter ever day like I should and I only clean the brush when I think of it, but he keeps chugging away. I love coming down to clean floors every morning! I don’t even have to move the chairs and he just does his thing (see photo). I think the only reason I would ever consider a more expensive vacuum would be if I had areas to block off. But I don’t, so he works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: msh87

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you live in Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum for about 1 year until it stopped working. I did all the trouble-shooting and nothing helped. Finally I ordered a replacement battery. Over $50 later and I find there is NO WAY to get the battery to Hawaii since it's lithium. I'm still searching inter-island, but for now it is just sitting there collecting the dust it's supposed to be cleaning. Very bummed.
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead after 2yrs
customer_reviews.text: This was a simple relatively cheap robot vacuum, no frills, cleaned okay but in random patterns and repeating same spots several time so inefficient overall; hair got stuck inside; sometimes battery would die midway and robot would not make it back to the base even though its a small apartment - 600 sq ft one bedroom. Anyway, battery completely dead after 2yrs of moderate use. Called customer service (US-based) but since warranty was only for 12mos, have no choice but to buy a new battery (~$30 on amazon). Or a new vacuum (with Wifi); will try different brand.
customer_reviews.author: sava2015

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first. It worked great for a while.
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have had this almost a year it cannot vacuum my dining room. It gets stuck on nothing in the middle of the floor. It goes forward and acts like it is bumping into something, but there is nothing there. It will keep doing that until I stop it and take it to another room. I have tried repeatedly to get it to work. I relocated it, tried using the remote, no luck. All of a sudden it doesn't clean for very long. It used to run about two hours. Now sometimes it runs 45 minutes, sometimes less. Sometimes it can't find its way back home. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Anet

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to my expectation!
customer_reviews.text: This product came highly recommended by a friend. We own a lab and needed a cleaner that would be able to suck up the hair on a daily basis. The first couple of weeks it worked ok,I kept it because I thought it was me just being picky. We have hardwood floors and one small entryway carpet. It does not suck up the hair and when it goes over the entry carpet it leaves the hair on the edges between the edge of the carpet and the wood floor. I had a Roomba prior to this and I should have purchased another one. I am extremely disappointed by this purchase and I would love to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I was extremely hesitant at first since it's not a bigger names brand but my god it works just as well, maybe even better and it's so much cheaper! I am extremely satisfied with the suction ability from carpet to flooring, the zoning, and battery life. I've had this product for several months now and so far no problems have occurred. For the price and quality, it's definitely worth five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Karina A.

customer_reviews.title: Tough Little Guy
customer_reviews.text: We call him Pierre. Although he cleans in a random fashion, his cleaning is thorough and pretty quick. Most importantly, he is one sturdy little guy! While Pierre was cleaning my dog opened the basement door. I found the lint catcher at the bottom of the steps, unbroken but open. Pierre, who apparently kept cleaning after he plummeted down 14 steps, was found away from the stairwell with a dead battery. I thought for sure that was the end of Pierre, but there was not a single crack or even scratch on him! Today, he cleaned as normal, not missing a beat!
customer_reviews.author: HMeck

customer_reviews.title: We love this friendly little droid!
customer_reviews.text: We got this after a friend recommended it and couldn’t be happier. Given that this is on the cheaper end, we also got a roomba which was a bit more expensive to compare. The roomba was louder and far more aggressive, bumping into things all over the place. It did a fine job as a vacuuming, but the energy of this one was sooooo much more pleasant. She just goes around sweetly doing her job and feels like a nice helper! The vacuum is always full afterwards and the apartment looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and for the $ good value
customer_reviews.text: This is the second ILife robot vacuum that I purchased. This is a newer model than the other one I have. Both preform well and do a good job on cleaning the wood floors. The newer one is better on low carpet and seems to go over the thresholds better than the older model. I am very satisfied with both bet really like the newer model for its power, charge time and the filter system is improved over the older model which is an A3.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Mecs

customer_reviews.title: Get the protection plan
customer_reviews.text: Half of the buttons on the remote never worked, but you were still able to control on the unit, so it was tolerable. Programable but never started at the set time or even the same time daily. After about a month, it stopped starting automatically. Again, not that big of a deal because you can still turn off and on. It does wonderful with knowing where it gets stuck and going to those areas first and killing the battery. Its been about a year since purchase, and now it just stops randomly as if something is stuck in it, when there is nothing. Honestly a good product, but you do need to get the protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Huge time saver
customer_reviews.text: We named her Rosie and she does a great job on limited areas of the house. Perfect for the master bedroom and bath. I can shut her in there and let her run until her battery dies. I don't use the programming feature, as I only run her when I'm home since we have dogs. We've all seen the horror pictures of pet accidents smeared around the whole house. Uh, yikes. She has to be emptied every time I use her--but we are a busy country family with 3 dogs and a cat in the house plus all the other farm dirt we track in. I have wood and tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: tallchik

customer_reviews.title: Saves me time
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't perform miracles, but it definitely keeps me all wood floor house clean. It has no issue going over small door stops, which I thought would be an issue. I can walk through my house barefoot without feeling dirt or grime. Very light items may not get picked up as the little sweeping hands may blow it away before it can be sucked up, but that's a minor issue. I should note, I do not have pets, and from others I have heard that multiple pets strain these devices due to the hair.
customer_reviews.author: mrf

customer_reviews.title: ... to replace my dead Roomba and I am very happy I didn't pay twice as much for another one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my dead Roomba and I am very happy I didn't pay twice as much for another one. The A4s is very quiet and does a fantastic job. The remote is easy to use and the battery life on the A4s is over two hours! My Roomba would only run for one. Love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Dan A

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE! Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to update since I purchased this little vacuum in 2017. It is 2020 and the vacuum is still running GREAT! I own a lab and there is hair galore in my house. This vacuum picks up all the dirt that he tracks in and all of his hair. It works the best if I run it every day, as opposed to every few days, since the canister is so small and, my dog sheds so much. I would purchase this vacuum over and over again. I would absolutely recommend to someone else (i already have!). It was a great value for what you spend compared to a Roomba, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'd really recommend getting one with a brush at the bottom like these - it's super easy to remove and clean the air off compared to a normal vac. I've ordered multiple for family members for birthdays and they love them - their friends have even purchased some for themselves after seeing it in action! I personally have the i4 without the brushes for hair and my next purchase for myself will definitely be this model. They're quite modular, so if something breaks or wears out you can simply order extras. Simply a great robot vac and design.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. It runs upwards of 3 hours on one charge, and even though it appears to be going in a random pattern, everything somehow gets covered. I have tile & wood floors, 3 rugs of various height, and carpet - it conquers all with no problem. Great for dog hair. Even my hair - which I apparently shed in copious amounts. Our layout is unusual, but it manages to get into every room, then docks itself when finished. It may not have some of the fancier features in other product reviews, but does the job well. I'm happy as a lark that I don't need to push around a vaccuum cleaner twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: orchid

customer_reviews.title: Broke After 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review of this product and lowered my rating. After less than 3 months the vacuum stopped working. Wouldn’t power on after charging for days at a time or would turn on, move a few inches and then cut off. This is quite costly for a vacuum that appears to be poor quality. Even before the issue of it not powering on,it tends to spit out what it sucks up. I wouldn’t recommend spending your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: did not last a year
customer_reviews.text: Stop working and starting spinning in and beeping. I tried all trouble shooting options and emailed manufacturer. I ordered new wheel motors which worked for first time and then went back to doing the same thing over. No cleaning and adjusting of the items will make it work. I would not recommend this brand. I recently purchased a Roomba to replace this unit. I purchased a refurbished Neato on amazon a couple years ago that worked beautiful until my wife dropped it. hence the reason for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible... I can't even tell you how much cleaning time this little guy has saved me. And he (because mine is male apparently) does a much better job than I would do myself. No more dust bunnies, no more hairballs accumulating in the corners of the bathroom floor (ladies with long hair will know exactly what I'm talking about). You'll be amazed at what a good job it does getting into tight spots and cleaning around things (like kitchen chair legs for example). Seriously, best purchase of the year so far - if you can think of a million other things you'd rather be doing than sweeping your floor, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wayward robot
customer_reviews.text: The first run of this robot was hit or miss. It did not return to the base. Second run, it kept cleaning 3 small areas over and over and over until it shown. Not what I was looking for! Had to pick it up and take to another area. It didn't obsess these other areas. So, it returned to the obsessive area!! WTH? I picked it up and brought it to its base, as I had places to go and people to see. I have to return to the guide to see if I can get it to do like the robot I had before...which was great but didn't last long!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Works, quiet, battery, cleans
customer_reviews.text: Use: since November 2017 Pros: battery seems endless, really Cleans a healthy amount every single time and it really isnt hard to clean. Its basic, simple remote, alarm, different cleaning functions. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE. The original remote wasnt roght and the company sent us a new one without any fuss. Large brushes seem to work well and the suction power seems adaquate. Handels black colors and moving from carpet to hard floors fine. Quiet enough even more so on carpet. Cons: Really not too many. It doesnt have a sophisticated navigation system so it will clean the same area a few times.
customer_reviews.author: no need to know

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great for $200. It works um multi floor surface, which is good for my home. I will be adding a video of it docking to this review soon. I also like that it avoids stairs and has sensors on the bottom and also it is easy to clean out the Dust.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: $179 only worked a year.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at one yr. I did everything in videos suggested. I only used it twice a week. In the end would run 1 minute and stop and beep and no battery life left after charging on station and tried direct to wall. Wanted to try replacing battery. Contacted the company and they were not helpful, would not send replacement battery or offer $$ discount for new purchase. For $179 for that one year it did what I needed. Would not buy again, though.
customer_reviews.author: mom on the run

customer_reviews.title: I have allergies and was told to vacuum daily but I also have a bad shoulder and fighting a big vac more than once ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy this. . My daughter has the IRobot cleaner and loves it but it was to dear for me. My friend was telling me about her ILife cleaner so I decided to give this a try. I have allergies and was told to vacuum daily but I also have a bad shoulder and fighting a big vac more than once a week didn't work. I think this is a great compromise. You have to clean it out- but they send a handy brush to do that and the fact that it needs cleaned after every use just proves that it works!! I am really happy with this purchase. :) :) :)
customer_reviews.author: Cin C

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason it's so cheap
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a month and have tried it on just about every setting. No matter what, it seems to roam around aimlessly. It will stay in the same area just bumping around, going over the same areas again and again. Also, it gets stuck under my sofa, lounge chairs, and refrigerator, so I'm constantly having to pick it up and move it to another area. I also have two, big-time shedding dogs and have to constantly empty it because the canister is very small. With all of these problems, I can only run it when I'm home, and even then it's a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lesher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome robot vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this robot!!! I'm on my second one, the first lasted a little over 3 years. I had hoped for more years, but I didn't hesitate to get the exact same robot again. It works really well. Cleans all the crumbs from 4 year old child, all the long hair from wife and all the kitty litter and fur from 2 cats. And it does it every single night. I recommend emptying the bin daily, cleaning the filter weekly and replacing the filter monthly for best performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not very intelligent
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. You will spend more time baby sitting this vacuum than it would take to just vacuum. It is constantly getting stuck or trapped. In a couple months of having it it has returned itself to the dock 2 times. The rest of the times I find it stuck somewhere and carry it back. We had another robotic vacuum that was much better but stopped charging and got this as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rosta

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This Vacuum is great! I have it automatically clean up every day at 1PM and it transitions to carpet to tile to hardwood flawlessly. It has wheels on the bottom that will allow it to flex over small lips in doorways. I have had it tangle up in one wire, otherwise, it will just gnaw on it for a bit and spit it out and move on. It has two suction modes, for the first few days i left it on the stronger one and it was really picking up A LOT of stuff. Now that it is kind of doing 'maintenance cleans' it doesn't need the strongest level.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this babe for about a month now. With a dog, a cat, long hair, and a husband with a long beard this thing is a life savor. I used to sweep/squeegee/swifter every other day but now I do once a week or biweekly as this thing keeps things at bay. So far no major complaints. I haven’t tried prgamming it yet and just put it on as needed. Battery life seems pretty good and it gets enough that I feel comfortable letting my 8 month old crawl around. Digging it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a robot vacuum for awhile now! We have all hardwood floors, 2 dogs, a kid, and live on gravel. Its hard to keep up with the floors daily and thank goodness for this little guy! We named him Max and I love him just like he's apart of our family! He gets the job done! Sometimes he gets stuck under our fridge but for the most part he's done wonders! I thought I wanted one that could connect to my phone but honestly I don't mind just having a remote! If you are looking for something simple to help keep up with your floors, buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: We love this little vacume. It's our first one and wanted to not spend a ton of money on one. It cleans our hard wood floors, pet hair, kitchen floors, and our flatter rugs wonderfully. It won't go over rugs that aren't completely flat and it often gets stuck under our dressers and for some reason the battery seems to die while it's underneath our bed..but for the sake of not having to vacuum near as often and not paying an arm and a leg for it , we love it and recommend it to everyone.. especially if you have hard wood floors and pets!
customer_reviews.author: TMM

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a family member. I bought it and ... WOW!!! After charging it, I immediately put it to work. After 30 minutes, I stopped and clean it. I never knew that there was so much "invisible" dust and dirt on my floors. I now have a new best friend named "Junior" and I can't imagine life without it. It is major life-enhancing event. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner bot
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned better than my vacuum from two days ago. It did need a little bit of help. So I arranged things. But it was fun to watch the first run. I need to learn the scheduling for its night time runs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent. It is like a pet that you never have to feed. It keeps me from being lonely.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works as described and really gives a 100% effort. It really gets into every area of the floor and strong enough to flip the carpet if it is curled at the edge. It seems to have its own personality and can get annoyed when jammed under the edge of the sofa. It literally deficates part of what it vacuumed if you pick it up to move it when it is not ready to be touched. It is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Maxatawny Mike

customer_reviews.title: I have two high end model robotic vacuum cleaners that cost 3 times what I paid for the ILIFE A4s but find iLIFE excelled . . .
customer_reviews.text: I have two high end model robotic vacuum cleaners that cost 3 times what I paid for the ILIFE A4s. In my opinion, this robot is more intelligent. It does not require banging into walls, doors or furniture to adjust its cleaning pattern. It recognizes obstacles and backs away from them. It is also very quiet in comparison and cleans as well as the more expensive brand. Hopefully the robot will score as well in longevity. I am very impressed and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this once, but I will update if anything changes. I love this machine! It does exactly what it says it will do, and it will make my life so much easier. Has a little hard time around baseboards but the suction and bristles really do a great job of picking up tons of pet and human hair and dirt. This won’t replace your regular vacuum, which I never expected it to, but it’s great for picking up all the dust and dirt that we bring in from outside keeping our hardwoods looking great throughout the week until I have time to do a deep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gray

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Service Communication = Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I have LOVED this vacuum. The cleaning quality is great, it's easy to clean, and it was very affordable. However, it started making a terrible grinding noise last month and wouldn't work properly. I gave it an extra thorough cleaning as I usually do on Sundays, but it didn't stop. I tried to contact the company last week as per their 12 month warranty instructions, and I have heard nothing back. :( Really disappointed, since we use the vacuum every other day and had been recommending it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mabie

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty awesome. After reading the reviews the big thing ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty awesome. After reading the reviews the big thing seems to be an ability to find the base after cleaning. Mine doesn't have that issue. It finds home every time (or he finds his home... yes we talk of it like a member of the family or at least a pet). For some reason it won't get under the cabinet lip despite having the room to do so. Other than that it reaches all the spots of my open entry, living, dining and kitchen space. The dust and cat hair is definitely under control. Now he just needs some googly eyes...
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wake

customer_reviews.title: Reaches places that would otherwise go years between cleanings.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have loved this little robot! It sometimes get stuck and it definitely can't find it's way back to the charger without help, but it cleans well and reaches places we never could without it. Luckily, the remote can be used to get the bot close enough to the home station for it to figure it out. We use it mostly on our wood laminate flooring and tile, but occasionally will let it explore our two carpeted rooms as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I really like having my apartment vacuumed daily
customer_reviews.text: I was going to call it Rosie (Jetsons) or maybe Alice (Brady Bunch). But after having it awhile, I settled on "Puppy". It gets into things it shouldn't, eats the cats' toys, and every once in a while you have to go looking for it. It gets hung up on horizontal legged furniture & sometimes mats & small rugs. I really like having my apartment vacuumed daily. After it gets back to the base, just empty the bin and it is ready to go the next day. Make sure to rub his belly occasionally to clean out all the hair from the brushes. One would be amazed at how much hair is collected on the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Little trooper
customer_reviews.text: With three dogs and two parrots, this thing has been a life saver. You have to be around while it's running if you don't want to roomba proof your house, though, it gets stuck under the fridge and sofas a lot. I wouldn't say it's the quietest, but its brush is constantly filled with Great Pyrenees fur, so not sure that's the device's fault. Its return to home feature is also surprisingly reliable. We've accidentally knocked it out of charge and it readjusted itself to continue charging. Glad I went with this over the more expensive brands, it does everything I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and great at removing pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a blessing! Just recently diagnosed with allergies this guy has been able to help keep up on cleaning that we've been too busy for on a daily basis with a dog. It does a great job getting our yellow labs dog hair. Our Shark can suck up some more in a full upright but this robot has been a life changer quite literally. It does a great job reducing pet dander and picking up pet hair. It avoids steps well and works on our carpet, hardwoods, and tile.
customer_reviews.author: M. Monica

customer_reviews.title: Lazy to sweep?! Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My first automatic vacuum and it makes my floors smoother than ever. I have wood flooring and there’s always a thin substance but with this it sucks up every bits. I use this almost everyday and i do have to empty the compartment every time before i use it but it fits under the bed and couch perfectly! I love this and would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: NPK

customer_reviews.title: ILIFE vs Rumba
customer_reviews.text: I had an old rumba and it just wasn't cleaning as well as I thought it should. I saw the reviews on the ILIFE and thought I would give it a try. It did not disappoint. I am very pleased with how well this works. I have even vacuumed and then let the ILIFE go over the same area and it has picked up even more stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Avalon Direct is awesome! I give the company 5 stars for customer ...
customer_reviews.text: Avalon Direct is awesome! I give the company 5 stars for customer service! The iLife A4S works very well on both tight carpet and bare floors. I have three dogs, I run it every day, and it really helps keep the hair, ect., under control. The reason I only gave 4 stars is, the vacuum will get stuck under ledges that are just the same height as the vacuum, itself, so I have to keep an eye on it during operation. Not a big problem for me, because I just run it in the morning while I prepare for work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cologgi

customer_reviews.title: Just Love It.
customer_reviews.text: We were very hesitant to buy this. We've look at Roomba for years, but its just too expensive. We've had this a month and are just thrilled. We have hardwood and tile floors with a couple of area rugs with short tight pile. It has cleaned in places we couldn't reach, ever. It is fun to watch it work. My wife feels it gets fore dirt up per day than she used to get with the vacuum one a week. Oh and we were worried about the cat. She is terrified of our regular vacuum. She is mildly bore by this machine. And it is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I have only started using it since it just arrived but seems to be very efficient. We have no carpet so getting all the dust bunnies on our wood floors is our main goal. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R. Fleischer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I didn't expect much with this vacuum. It came with replacement brushes, filter, remote. It's easy to clean. It has an edging feature, as well as small area cleaning. It is a random pattern cleaner, though. Keeps going over the same areas and not cleaning others. The Web site didn't work to register the product and was in oriental lettering. They said they were working on it. The box states it's a 30 day free return, which is a plus. I haven't used it to totally run the battery down, so it hasn't gone to the "home". I have had it running over an hour or two and it's still cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on what it covers, but it doesn't cover much
customer_reviews.text: Gets itself stuck between chair legs and if there are any ripples in my carpet, it moves back and forth for a few seconds and shuts down. Another annoying thing is that it doesn't cover the whole room. I locked it in one of my bedroom and in that room, I have an 8 foot by 8 foot rug. I let it roam in the room for about 25 minutes and eventually, the battery died. I deliberately placed some tiny pieces of white lint in a few spots on my mocha carpet. It only got 3 of the ten pieces.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: More random than Barr body formation.
customer_reviews.text: Great for hard floors. He completely avoids the carpet mats even though they are a low commercial grade pile. As others have said, the pattern is random. I would love to see the code that programmed this. But when he works, he does a good job. Getting him (we named him Henry) to go home is hit and miss. Even when in same room he takes a random pattern to get back to his home. If he is in a different room I have not seen him succeed in that yet. However, it may have just taken more time than I was willing to give it due to the random pattern. So far, we are satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. John Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver, although, would like her to "poop'
customer_reviews.text: Dot is a lifesaver given my health issues that make vacuuming difficult. At first you have to watch her to see how to dot-proof your house. After that, she'll be fine. I still think they should make one that "poops" out the debris when full. That is waaaaaayyyy more desirable a feature than scanning the room, or random vs. paths, etc. If she pooped out the debris, that'd really eliminate the bending/lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Becky

customer_reviews.title: Still working after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: It still works well. Had a scare about it not working anymore but seems like the side button was turned off accidentally. While the lights are still lit up (doesn't mean it is off), the robot wont move when the switch is off.
customer_reviews.author: Internet Explorer

customer_reviews.title: Best robotic Vacs EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with ILife vacs. I have the A4, which I LOVE. My A4 is 3 years old and going strong! I got this A4s because nothing lasts forever and I didn't want to scramble for a replacement. This has the same quality features I appreciate in my A4. I owned a couple of of robo type vacs before ALife, thought I liked them, but I am spoiled now for any other brand! These are quiet, efficient, and dependable!
customer_reviews.author: linda v

customer_reviews.title: Made us happy!
customer_reviews.text: While it doesn't substitute for a thorough cleaning, it really does a great job of keeping our hardwood floors barefoot ready. The only reason that I gave 4 stars is because it seldom finds "home" by itself. The dust bin seems about right and is easy to clean and easy to clean filter. The bot is able to negotiate thru the rooms and is able to clean under most of our furniture without getting lost. Overall I would recommend it if you have hardwood or tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: works amazing
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to replace my 5 year old A4s. The pro is a much nicer machine. Has the electrowall and the rubber brush part. I loved my A4s and like this one even more.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine. It’s life changing. If you’re trying to decide, go for it. I have used it most every day since I’ve had it and it doesn’t disappoint. It goes under the entertainment center and under the couch. I clean it out after each use and clear out the filter too. I clean the roller when I can see anything on it. It occasionally will get caught on a rug, but not often. I have tile floors in my living area and carpet in the bedrooms. It does a great job. I love that I don’t have dog hair everywhere now and there’s no grit on the floor. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Love this robot
customer_reviews.text: Took a gamble with this product and it totally paid off. I've never owned something like this and decided to get a less expensive, non-name brand. I love it. It's a lot quieter than I was expecting. Perhaps it's not super strong, I don't know. But it doesn't matter because it works great for my purposes since I use it on hardwood floors to pick up dog hair and dust bunnies. I've only had it for a couple of weeks so my review is not on its durability.
customer_reviews.author: DcFL

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift to human kind. I have a 1 yr old so I never have time to vacuum. We named ours "Otto". In our new home there is only hardwood flooring. This purchase was a must and we aren't disappointed. Only issue I see is that when you empty the container that holds the dirt, hair and dust some of it falls out back onto the floor. The lip of the container is open too wide and a lot falls out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Great value. I have only had for ten days but I am very happy so far. I bought to replace a Roomba and this little vacuum is working great! I like it better because it is not as heavy and easier for me to pick up. It also does not get stuck under the dishwasher or other places like my Roomba did and is quieter.
customer_reviews.author: texas buyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Con: Bought it to help with in-between cleaning of dog hair but the opening is not large enough, or the power strong enough to suck the hair into the container so it gets stuck in the opening and has to be cleaned out manually which is a mess. Would probably work well on crumbs and small debris though. Might work on dog hair that is very tiny, but we have med dogs with short hair and it doesn't work....even after a major cleaning as a touch up. Pro: It does have a long battery life and went from hard floor over onto low carpet and crossed cords with no problem! Stops at top of stairs and turns.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I’ve named her Rosie
customer_reviews.text: Wow -- this vacuum is amazing. I just received it yesterday and ran it for a little while last night. I was shocked at it's cleaning power and ease of emptying, including untangling the brush (I have long hair). It charged over night and started right on schedule this morning. It's amazingly quiet (doesn't even scare my cat who freaks out with my Shark vacuum). If it keeps running like this, I'll have no complaints. Definitely seems to be worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Casey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a good floor cleaning robot.
customer_reviews.text: The first A4s I received didn't work. I contacted ILife and once they heard the alarm my unit was sending, they arranged for a return to either them or Amazon. I decided to return it to Ilife. The new one they sent me works great! I will give it another 2 months and if I don't see "dust bunnies" I will give this a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: raz

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and smart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for wife who is suffering from bad cat allergy. We use a basic robot to clean the places that cats stay often and this one is in the bedroom. This vacuum works well on our berber carpet. Suction is strong, noise is low, and sensor is sensitive enough to avoid running into walls. Like the function of self docking. Only one thing I suggest is a bigger dustbin.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Wears and tears parts after use of ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially was quite but after 6 months of use, once a week, it makes lot of sounds. Suction is not good, doesn't do anything on corners because it picks in clock and anti clock motion. Overall nowhere near to good quality. Wouldn't buy it again and wouldn't recommend it to anyone as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania Paun Singh

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest, I wasn't that impressed with this vacuum. I have hardwood floors and don't have pets, so I thoughts this would be an easy solution. However, after a couple of days of usage in one room, it cleaned up about 80% of the dirt and just sort of moved the other 20% around. Not a big deal, but I ended up getting the dustpan and brush to continue cleaning. At that point, I kinda shrugged my shoulders and didn't feel this was really 20X better than a broom, which costs 20X less.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Preston

customer_reviews.title: Loved it while it lasted!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product while it lasted. Worked wonderfully on my wood floors and short carpets, actually even worked on my sons shaggy-ish rug. Loved it! Was great for keeping floors clear of stuff and every once in a while needed to take out my other vacuum to get into corners etc. However, I have now owned this product for 7 months apx. and it seems to be failing on me. It shuts off frequently and completely randomly as far as I can tell. I’ve tried cleaning it out obviously, and removing all the hair from the spinning part and still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great if Used Daily. Amazing Option to More Expensive Models and Brands
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have floor mapping and is reactive, does an efficient job at cleaning as long as it is scheduled to clean every day. Will wrap up easily on loose cords and shoe laces so if cords are tied up out of the way and floor isnt cluttered this machine works like a dream. Had the misfortune of the vacuum running over and smearing dog poop. Though time consuming I found it incredibly easy to clean and it worked liked brand new afterwards. It's a good option if you are wary of buying a more expensive brand and want to try out a robotic vacuum or are on a budget. Mine has been working fine for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum cleaner since 5/17. It's still working very well. It picks up hair very well but it's a little bit of a hassle to clean it off the brush. The couple of times it has failed was because I hadn't cleaned my wife's long hair from the brush and edge brushes. It's been a great help. I was worried about it not lasting when I purchased it. No more.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 11 months
customer_reviews.text: Died after 11 months of light use. I have a maid that comes and cleans so I literally used this vacuum maybe an hour a week. It did pick up tons of dog hair and junk reliably. But it stopped going home when the battery was low after a few months. Now, it won’t run for more than a few minutes before it craps out. Called manufacturer and I have to mail it ha k to them USPS for $13. Not sure how long the warranty process will take. I also purchased the additional warranty from Asurion but it doesn’t take affect until manufacturers warranty period ends.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Powell

customer_reviews.title: Erratic Robot Does a Good Job
customer_reviews.text: I think this robot should be called I Lift instead of I Life. It does an amazingly good job of keeping the main areas of our home clean. Of course, given it's shape, it doesn't do so well in corners. But with a combination of rugs and hardwood floors, we are pleased with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: B.Wolff

customer_reviews.title: This is a great robotic vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made! My cleaning lady said it doesn't look like I have a dog. (she comes once every 3 weeks). And my dog doesn't go crazy when its on because its pretty quiet. I like that it goes under chairs and under my bed where the regular vacuum can't go. And when its done it just goes back to its charger to be ready for next time. It keeps my hardwood and tile floors and rugs clean which makes the whole house seem clean. And all I do is push a button.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well For a Few Days Only
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the Euffy robotic vacuum at the same time to compare their quality, and for the first few weeks, they worked equally well. Now, 4 weeks in (and outside the return date), the ILife won't start even though it has been cleaned and fully charged. It is such a disappointment to have no recourse.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Egerton

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but keep an eye on it
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this works really well. However, as some other people have mentioned - you have to keep an eye on it. Ours has gotten stuck on rugs and cords, and has even ripped a phone charger off the wall - so you really have to make sure those “smaller” hazards are not on its path. I like that you can just set up a time for it to run each day. Runs for about an hour and a half each day, and seems to rotate which rooms it focuses on - which is fine for our needs. I find we need to empty it every 2-3 days. Overall, good little robot.
customer_reviews.author: emmagf

customer_reviews.title: The low sound mode that this defaults to also sucks up much less dirt
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the older design because it defaulted to high vacuum mode. The low sound mode that this defaults to also sucks up much less dirt, making the robot useless unless I start it then hit the max button. Unfortunately the remote for the A4 also triggers my older model iLife robot, so it tends to start one up while turning off the other. If you remember to hit MAX after starting it, then the new model is just as good as the old one. The dirt tray is also a bit nicer to dump from, even though it is physically smaller than the older model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Works surprisingly well for what it is. This won't get deep into carpeting, but it's good for keeping things relatively clean between regular vacuuming sessions. It's home function is somewhat tweaky though. After hitting the home button, it slows down and flounders for awhile before I just get frustrated and either pick it up or manually guide it (through directional button pushes) back to it's base. Other than that. it does a good job on non-carpeted floors
customer_reviews.author: An observer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price as other reviews say it gets stuck under furniture very frequently! Doesn’t always make it back to be charged either. Does a deep clean. Has no rhyme or reason for where it goes: will go to one room before finished and takes a long time. It’s good for while you are doing other chores but handheld gets done faster and doesn’t have to be constantly watched.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I'll run this guy 1-2 times a day and it amazes me how much it picks up even though the floors are clean. I gaveit a 4 star cause it sometimes takes forever to return home when prompted to and the remote has to be within a few feet for it to work, other than that, I would recommend this product 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Salemi

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, effective, lasts 2+ hours and much cheaper than a Roomba
customer_reviews.text: This is my first robo vacuum and I have no means to compare against other products. What I know is that it is very quier, lasts 2+ hours and very occasionally gets stack under the furniture or tangled with wires. It collects a lot of debris and thanks to it I am having my place quite clean without having to put almost any time at all cleaning it. My landlady owns a Roomba and she wants to buy this one now after having seen it in action. When I told her how much I paid for it she was even more into buying it, her Roomba was lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno  Femenía Castella

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with our iLife A4s Robot Vac. We've named it "Dusty". It's made well and does an excellent job of sweeping the floors (carpet & linoleum), throughout our 1200 square feet ranch home. When it finishes running, it always returns to its docking station. After each days sweeping is complete, there's always allot of dirt, dust & debris in its dust cup. I just empty the cup, wipe it out & wipe the outside of Dusty. That's it! Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: MarvElls

product_meta.title: ILIFE A4s Robot Vacuum Cleaner with Strong Suction, over 100mins Run time, Self-charging, Slim, Quiet, Ideal for Hard Floors to Medium Carpets
feature_bullets: The Gen 3 CyclonePower cleaning system with a strong suction provides thorough and concentrated cleaning. Adjusts to floor types - thin carpet, tile, hardwood, laminate & more.
Superior battery-group brings up to 100mins cleaning time which makes work easily and it also has a prolonged life time.
Multiple smart sensors avoid bumping around or falling off stairs. The A4s even cleans under beds, along the walls and around the clutter. Dirt can not hide.
Schedule your cleaning hours where the A4s will automatically start to clean .Automatically returns to the charging base when power is low.

What You Get: ILIFE A4s robot vacuum, remote control, charging dock, AC power adapter, cleaning tool, extra set of high-performance filters, extra set of side brushes, user guide and our worry-free 12-month warranty,offer our best service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,621 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
